name: Hired Guns: The Jagged Edge
description:
Hired Guns: The Jagged Edge is a strategy game developed by GFI Russia. It was originally released in 2007. It was published by Matrix Games. On review aggregator Metacritic, Hired Guns: The Jagged Edge has a score of 58. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Hired Guns: The Jagged Edge is available on PC.
